title: Once Upon a Time in Ukraine
overview: What if Taras Shevchenko put down his pen and took a samurai sword into his hands?  Akayo samurai enters the territory of Ukraine, seeking revenge on the Japanese Harimoto--a buyer of slaves from a Ukrainian master. On his way, Akayo meets the serf Taras, who is also guided by personal revenge and wants to organize the release of his beloved.
